data.title: Karl Marx Souvenirs
data.text:
Karl Marx 5 D-Mark commemorative coin

This 5 D-Mark commemorative coin was first issued on June 21, 1983 on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of his death. The picture side is adorned with a portrait of Marx. On the value side, the German federal eagle (national emblem...

€19.90 *

Karl Marx 20 Mark commemorative coin

On the occasion of the 100th anniversary of his death, the VEB (state-owned company) Mint Berlin minted this 20 mark commemorative coin. It was designed by Heinz Hoyer and Sneschana Russewa-Hoyer and was first issued on April 6, 1983....

€19.90 *

Karl Marx 100 mark banknote

The 100 mark banknote was introduced in 1975 and was the highest denomination in the GDR. While the front features a portrait of Karl Marx and the national coat of arms, the back is adorned with a view of the boulevard "Unter den Linden"...

€24.90 *

Karl Marx stamp set - stages of his life

On the 100th anniversary of his death, the GDR issued a special six-part set of stamps of 10, 20, 35, 50, 70 and 85 pfennigs. The different value levels address different works or phases of Marx's life, with Friedrich Engels and Vladimir...

€19.90 *

Cotton bag: - Karl Marx & Engels

Discover the many benefits of our fashionable and environmentally friendly accessory to carry your groceries. Consisting of 100% cotton with imprint of Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels. What else to say than "Der eine Marx, der andere...

€6.95 *

Karl Marx Music Box - Internationale

This Music Box with Karl Marx on it, is more than just an eye-catcher. It also is an enjoyment for your ears, while playing the melody of the "International"

€16.95 *

Karl Marx - Magnet black/white

Whether at the fridge or as a small gift among friends. The Karl Marx magnet in black and white always brings philosophy.

€3.95 *

Art Magnet Karl Marx

The magnet with the portrait of the famous philosopher Karl Marx brightens up every gray fridge. The magnet was made by the Trier artist Anja Streese. Size: about 7.5cm x 5.5cm

€3.95 *

Magnet 4er Set

Why have to choose between the magnets? Treat yourself with 4 magnets with Trier motifs on the price of one! Single Magnets in the size of 4x4 cm

€4.95 *

Karl Marx Tea

Designed, carefully put together by hand with exquisite fruits and berries and packaged in Trier. Natural product without flavorings. Preparation: Pour boiling water over 2-3 tbsp / 1 liter and let it steep for 5-10 minutes. Contents:...

€5.95 *

Weinfreunde Marx & Engels

Part threel of the triology. First book "Wie der Wein Karl Marx zum Kommunisten machte" is also available here! The Story of the development of a friendship. Viewed through the bottom of a wine glass. Our recommendation: Jens Baumeister...

€14.90 *

Karl Marx between pawnbrokers and champagne

Sequel of the triology. First book "Wie der Wein Karl Marx zum Kommunisten machte" is also available here! How a revolutionary made his way through life with cunning and treachery. Our recommendation: Jens Baumeister is an art historian...

€17.90 *

How wine turned Karl Marx into a communist (Book)

The story at becoming a great thinker. Viewed through the bottom of a wine glass. Our recommendation: Jens Baumeister is an art historian and wine lecturer. He has been guiding tourists in and around Trier since 1993. His tour of Marx...

€17.90 *

Karl Marx - lighter

Where is it better to philosophize than with a cigarette or by candlelight? Lighter with imprint of the famous philosopher and Trier-born Karl Marx.

€1.95 *

Magnet Karl Marx

For Karl Marx fans, the little red magnet with the imprint of the philosopher born in Trier is a real Must-have on every refrigerator door.

€3.95 *

Karl Marx Key Chain + trolley coin silver

With this pendant you not just have a nice accessory on the keychain, but moreover a shopping aid always with you. In the form of the great thinker and philosopher Karl Marx. Who could be a better help with your capital? Who could be a...

€4.95 *

Karl Marx 0 Euro Souvenir Note

In memory of the most famous son of the city of Trier, the Trier Tourism and Marketing GmbH proudly presents its 0 Euro Souvenir note. In honor of Karl Marxs 200th birthday, his face is printed on this bill. The purple 0 Euro bank note,...

€3.00 *

Karl Marx Pin

The small souvenir for everyone. The Karl Marx Pin in the color silver with image of the great philosopher on it.

€3.95 *

Karl Marx Stamps Set - Collectors Edition

To honour the 200th birthday of Karl Marx, the Post of China designed stamps with the image of Karl Marx on it. In this edition, you will receive the exclusive stamps in a set and untouched envelope.

€5.00 *
